statements: SELECT * FROM financial_behavior_outliers;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM financial_behavior_outliers ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_category FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_category FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_type = 'purchase'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_category FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM financial_behavior_outliers GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM financial_behavior_outliers WHERE transaction_category IN ('Food', 'Clothing')
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM outliers WHERE is_resolved = true
SELECT transaction_id, reason FROM outliers ORDER BY outlier_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '1bf2d861-7be0-4b64-8926-8ada79adeeb7';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, o.reason FROM transactions t JOIN outliers o ON t.transaction_id = o.transaction_id WHERE o.is_resolved = false;
SELECT transaction_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING max_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_type FROM users WHERE user_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_type = 'premium' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM outliers WHERE outlier_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, reason FROM outliers WHERE outlier_flag = true;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT c.name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) FROM categories c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.category_id = t.transaction_id GROUP BY c.name
SELECT o.user_id, o.reason, u.name FROM outliers o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE o.outlier_flag = True
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT users.username, accounts.balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id WHERE accounts.balance > 1000 ORDER BY accounts.balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, outlier_type FROM outliers WHERE outlier_date >= '2022-01-01' AND outlier_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT user_id, AVG(balance) AS avg_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_balance > 500 ORDER BY avg_balance DESC;
